Detailed Description

Crash log host data.

This contains information about the host system, including operating system and architecture.

Property Documentation

◆ operatingSystemBuild

- (NSString*) operatingSystemBuild
readnonatomicassign

The operating system's build identifier (eg, 10J869).

This may be unavailable, and this property will be nil.

◆ PLCR_DEPRECATED

- (PLCrashReportArchitecture architecture) PLCR_DEPRECATED
readnonatomicassign

Architecture.

Deprecated:
The architecture value has been deprecated in v1.1 and later crash reports. All new reports include the CPU type as part of the crash report's machine info structure, using the PLCrashReportProcessorInfo extensible encoding.

◆ processorInfo

- (PLCrashReportProcessorInfo*) processorInfo
readnonatomicassign

The processor type.

For v1.2 reports and later, this is an alias to the machine info's processorInfo. For earlier reports, this will be synthesized from the deprecated architecture property.

◆ timestamp

- (NSDate*) timestamp
readnonatomicassign

Date and time that the crash report was generated.

This may be unavailable, and this property will be nil.
